inputs.topic_category_motivation: Policy event: Fed Powell rate cut hint at Jackson Hole, a monetary policy signal affecting markets.
inputs.motivation_for_relevance: Powell’s dovish hint at Jackson Hole 2025 signals potential rate cuts, expected to lower UST yields, strengthen USD, boost risk‑on equities, and influence commodity prices.
inputs.importance_classification_rationale: Fed Powell’s hint at rate cuts is a high‑centrality policy signal that can move rates, yields, equity and commodity markets within hours to days. It is a central‑bank guidance outside a formal meeting, thus fitting the "high" cadence (every 3600s) and multi‑asset relevance.

llm_topic_proposal_raw.motivation: Powell’s dovish hint at Jackson Hole (Aug 22 2025) triggered a crypto rally, providing a clear catalyst for market moves.
llm_topic_proposal_raw.name: Fed Powell Rate Cut Hint (Jackson Hole 2025)

generated_query.motivation: This query aggregates all key terms related to Ether, Bitcoin, crypto market dynamics, Fed policy signals, institutional buying, regulatory developments, and market sentiment, ensuring comprehensive coverage of relevant news, analysis, and data across major crypto and macro channels.
generated_query.query: ((ETH OR Ether OR Ethereum OR ETHEREUM OR ETH) OR (BTC OR Bitcoin OR BTCORBIT) OR (crypto OR cryptocurrency OR cryptocurrencies OR crypto market OR crypto assets) OR (Fed OR Federal Reserve OR Powell OR Jackson Hole OR rate cuts OR interest rate cuts OR rate cut) OR (risk-on OR risk-off OR market rally OR market movement OR market reaction) OR (ETF OR exchange-traded fund OR exchange traded fund OR ETFs OR crypto ETF OR bitcoin ETF OR ether ETF OR ETF inflows OR ETF demand OR ETF flows) OR (stablecoin OR stablecoins) OR (regulatory tailwinds OR regulatory environment OR regulatory changes OR GENIUS Act OR Project Crypto) OR (retirement plans OR 401k OR retirement accounts OR executive order OR Trump OR President) OR (Bitmine Immersion OR SharpLink Gaming OR DeFi Development OR Coinbase OR Galaxy Digital OR Iren) OR (price OR all-time high OR record OR price surge OR price drop OR price decline OR price erases gains) OR (news OR analysis OR report OR update OR latest OR breaking OR today OR recent OR trend OR movement OR volatility OR change OR shift OR impact OR reaction))
